Name: autosomal dominant Alport syndrome
Definition: An Alport syndrome that has_material -basis_in heterozygous mutation in the COL4A3 gene.

Name: autosomal recessive Alport syndrome
Definition: An Alport syndrome that has_material -basis_in homozygous or compound heterozygous mutation in the COL4A3 or the COL4A4 gene

Name: X-linked Alport syndrome
Definition: An Alport syndrome that has_material_basis_in mutation in the gene encoding the alpha-5 chain of basement membrane collagen type IV (COL4A5).
